channel.title: Adding dclaws special attack
channel.description:
So my special attacks perfect + right movements.. But now i find the model of the attack special 11191 so how i add that to my special like u see stribes when u spec etc (blood)
Thanks you for your help runb4,

item.title: Adding dclaws special attack
item.dc:creator: @sjoukjeowns sjoukjeowns
item.description:
@sjoukjeowns wrote:

[quote=“daved, post:4, topic:325935”]I also need to find that out, coz i get some nasty errors each time i follow a tutorial on dclaws spec.

The best that worked was the one that i coded my self, but i didn’t know how to declare some symbols…[/quote]
lol it’s not hard to get a dclaws special attk with dds special but i want my own:| i did some moddeling and got my own spec model thingy:|
